name: DLUR
description:
Configure your keys while learning the basic directions in different languages! You will feel your mistakes and your correctness.

The game happens in two phases:
-Setting phase: You configure your W,A,S,D keys by dragging in the direction of your comfort (and your recognition/knowledge of languages).

-Game phase: After your key configuration phase, you have to reach the goal before the time runs out, there are traps and obstacles.

You can come across two scenarios
Best Case Scenario Gameplay:
